TEXT.English: [TAB]Bored of your monotonous life? Ready for adventures? Adventure Tours bring to you the excitement of scubadiving, horseback riding, exploration of ancient ruins or watching the biggest animals on earth's face in their own habitat. Spice up your life with us!

TEXT.English: Your local adventure franchise to get your adrenaline pumping!
